item.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA
item.description: softmax SoftMax is a new company researching fresh approaches to fundamental problems in Reinforcement Learning (RL). During my visiting role there, I focused on learning problems. First, how do the people at Softmax learn about RL research, and learn from each other? We built new tools to support this process better. Second, how do people learn the SoftMax platform itself? I started work on Python notebooks to shorten the path from a standing start to running a real RL experiment.
